title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 630.6 - Records and reports
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 630.6 - Records and reports

State Regulations
(a) The center shall keep complete and accurate records of its activities, including data on the type of services rendered, the number of displaced
homemakers assisted and costs involved. (b) The center shall submit to the Industrial

Commissioner bimonthly reports on activities and finances, and a semiannual
progress report. (c) The center
shall cooperate in the accumulation, submission and analysis of data which will
permit an evaluation of the effectiveness of the services rendered by the
center. The evaluation shall relate to factors such as the number of persons
served, the quality of the services, the number of job placements and the needs
and direction for future programs. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
630.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
